description: Astilbe arendsii 'Rotlicht' RED LIGHT is an amazing flowering perennial that blooms in USDA zones 3-9. Its clusters of deep red, feathery plumes provide exquisite color and texture that are sure to bring a touch of glamour to any garden. In late spring, plants begin to spike up with lacy, delicate, pinkish-red flowers that age to a deeper shade of crimson. In fall, the blooms transition to bronze-colored seedpods that are attractive in their own right. Deer and drought tolerant, this hardy plant requires little maintenance other than trimming spent blooms. With its brilliant colors, long flowering season, and easy maintenance, Astilbe arendsii 'Rotlicht' is sure to add eye-catching beauty to any garden.
